effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.platinum: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
